attributes.action: To find a new location for training nights for the All Saints boxing club, Llanbradach, South Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For 46 years there has been an amateur boxing club in LLanbradach, South Wales. The club has recently been told to vacate the premises they rent off the local diocese within 1 month, it is believed that the church want to sell the land for flats. This gym has produced numerous Welsh and British Champions, also members of Welsh Commonwealth games teams of the past. Please sign our petition to help us find a new location to host training sessions for the huge numbers that attend every night.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
